channel.title: NashBitDevs
channel.description: NashBitDevs is a community in the Nashville area for those interested in discussing and participating in the research and development of Bitcoin and related protocols and software.

item.title: NashBitDevs Socratic Seminar #35
item.author: Unknown
item.description:
Agenda

5:00pm Meet and greet and pizza
6:00pm Socratic seminar discussion of various bitcoin topics
7:30pm Further hangout TBD

Location

The event is hosted at Bitcoin Park:

VIP conference room
1910 21st Ave S
Nashville, TN 37212

Map

Parking Info

Announcements

Join us for the NashBitDevs Socratic Seminar! A special thank you to our sponsors Bitcoin Park for hosting us and for providing the pizza.

Reminders

  • No photos, videos, audio recording
  • Chatham House Rule
  • Leave the meeting space as clean as you found it
  • Suggest topics for the next Socratic Seminar! Where to find topics?
  • Use sats to pay for drinks from the cafe via the BTCPay server terminal

Raffle

  • Guess the next block nonce
    • Must be 8 hex characters, 0-9 and A-F, eg. 9A74E2B1
  • Winner(s) ranked by numeric closeness to next block nonce

Socratic Seminar

Events

  • Park 102: Workshop, Thurs Sept 11 @5pm
  • Bitcoin Custody & Treasury Summit 2025, Sept 17 [JOIN THE WAITLIST]
  • Imagine IF - The Summit of Summits, Sept 19 [JOIN THE WAITLIST]

News

  • "We Just Found Malicious Code in the Popular NPM Package" JD
  • "New Market Structure Draft Amends Money Transmission Laws To Protect Developers" the rage
  • Block 913272 was found by a small miner using QAxe++
  • Proto Rig and Proto Fleet: A paradigm shift in bitcoin mining
  • Nunchuck adds miniscript
    • Walkthru video
    • Valentino - Miniscript refresher
  • Bitcoin Safe releases v1.5

Bitcoin Projects

  • Introduce script tagging rust-bitcoin#4907
  • Add bitcoin-{node,gui} to release binaries for IPC bitcoin#31802
  • Core Data Obfuscation
    • Obfuscate chainstate bitcoin#6650
    • blockstorage: XOR blocksdir *.dat files bitcoin#28052
  • Add initializing wallet configuration with bdk-cli wallet init bdk-cli#203
  • rust-cktap project refreshed
  • PR on Bitcoin Knots for CTV & CSFS
  • Rambling on Schnorr Signature aggregation and current use cases

Lightning Projects

  • Relai removes lightning
  • Spark
    • Xverse + Spark
    • Blitz + Spark network errors
  • LQWD - 24% annualized Bitcoin yield on the Lightning Network in just 24 days

Research

  • L0RINC IBD analysis
  • Simplicity launched on Liquid
    • Delving Simplicity Part Ⅰ: Three Fundamental Ways of Combining Computations
    • Delving Simplicity Part Ⅱ: Combinator Completeness of Simplicity
    • Delving Simplicity Part Ⅲ: Building Data Types
  • Misbehaving nodes found by Antoine Poinsot

Socratic Seminar

Events

  • Open House #26 Value for Value Music Night, Wed. Aug. 15 @5pm
  • Nashville LitDevs #2, Mon Sep. 8 @5pm
  • (next) NashBitDevs Socratic Seminar #35, Tues Sep. 9 @5pm
  • Park 102: Workshop, Thurs Sept 11 @5pm
  • Bitcoin Custody & Treasury Summit 2025, Sept 17 [JOIN THE WAITLIST]
  • Imagine IF - The Summit of Summits, Sept 19 [JOIN THE WAITLIST]

News

  • [SNI] "Introducing The Reorg"
  • [BM] "Samourai Wallet Developers Plead Guilty to Conspiring to Operate an Unlicensed Money Transmitting Business"
    • Peer-to-peer Rights Fund
  • [BM] "Tornado Cash Trial Concludes: Roman Storm Found Guilty on One of Three Counts"
  • Jack D. announces Bitchat is now available on the Apple App Store
  • OpenSats - Advancements in Developer Libraries
    • The Payjoin Foundation is announced at Bitcoin++ Riga

Bitcoin Projects

  • Augur: Block’s Open Source Bitcoin Fee Estimation Library
  • [bitcoindev] A Taproot-native (re-)bindable transaction bundle proposal
  • [core] RPC: Return permitbaremultisig and maxdatacarriersize in getmempoolinfo #29954
  • Changing the minimum relay feerate
    • PR 133106 - policy: lower the default blockmintxfee, incrementalrelayfee, minrelaytxfee
    • PR - test: Update p2p_ibd_tx_relay.py to support minrelaytxfee as low as 100 sats/kvB
  • BTCPay Server 2.2.0 Release
  • [core] descriptors: MuSig2 #31244
  • [core] p2p: TxOrphanage revamp cleanups #32941
  • [bdk_ffi] BDK wallet 2.0 Release for language bindings
  • [bdk_ffi] Remove Python #815
  • [bdk_wallet] Release wallet-2.1.0
  • f2pool is mining annex-containing transactions now
    • bitcoin++ - F2Pool and MARA are mining Taproot Annexes
    • labitbu
  • New Sankey visual on stratum.work
  • Interactive explainer of wallet seed phrases, entropy, and BIP39

Lightning Projects

  • LDK - LSPS5 implementation
  • Bitronics guide - Connecting your home miner to OCEAN and Configuring Payouts Using the Lightning Network
  • Amboss- The New Magma Is Live
  • Voltage - Introducing Node-Backed Wallets: The Best of Lightning Payments with Full Node Control

Research

  • Stats on compact block reconstructions
  • [bitcoindev] Taproot is post-quantum secure when restricted to script-path spends
  • "Block filter design guide" by @rustaceanrob
  • Chain Code Delegation: Private Access Control for Bitcoin Keys
